contenido.enproceso: Sorry, but we are still working on the functionality of lost segments. It will be simulated without loss
contenido.cookies: No information of any kind is stored. No cookies are used
contenido.aviso: Browser not supported. Use a Chromium-based browser, such as Google Chrome, Vivaldi, or Microsoft Edge
contenido.guia: A user guide is available by clicking on the
contenido.guia2: button located on the top bar
contenido.movil2: icon to display the parameters menu and run the simulation
contenido.encuesta: We are conducting an assessment survey. Please, participate by clicking
contenido.mssclien-tooltip: Maximum segment size to transmit (in bytes)
contenido.datosclien-tooltip: Size of data to transmit (in bytes)
contenido.snclien-tooltip: Sequence number by which the client starts
contenido.mssserv-tooltip: Maximum segment size to transmit (in bytes)
contenido.datosserv-tooltip: Size of data to transmit (in bytes)
contenido.snserv-tooltip: Sequence number by which the server starts.
contenido.umbral-tooltip: Value which, if exceeded by the congestion window, would be changed to 'Congestion Avoidance'
contenido.cierre-tooltip: Device that initiates the connection closure
contenido.error-mss: The maximum segment size to transmit (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-datosclien: The size of the data to transmit (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-snclien: The sequence number by which the client starts must be greater than 0
contenido.error-segperdclien: The lost segments have to be numbers separated by commas
contenido.error-wclien: The reception window (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-mssserv: The maximum segment size to transmit (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-datosserv: The size of the data to transmit (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-snserv: The sequence number by which the server starts must be greater than 0
contenido.error-segperdserv: The lost segments have to be numbers separated by commas
contenido.error-wserv: The reception window (in bytes) must be greater than 0
contenido.error-timeout: The timeout must be equal to or greater than 0. 0 disables the timeout
contenido.error-umbral: The threshold/ssthresh must be greater than 1
contenido.error-algort: You must select a congestion algorithm to use
contenido.error-cierre: You must select the device to initiate the connection closure

infoparametros.titulo: Parameters required to perform the TCP simulation
infoparametros.encuentas: The following is taken into account for the simulation
infoparametros.encuenta1: The propagation time will be 'half a tick'
infoparametros.encuenta2: The data length of SYN, ACK and FIN flags will be 0 bytes
infoparametros.encuenta3: Communications will be between two entities, 'client' (which starts the communication and sends data) and 'server' (which responds with more data)
infoparametros.politicaACK: The confirmation policy for the reception of segments will be carried out as follows
infoparametros.politicaACK1: During the establishment phase and the connection closure, they settle immediately
infoparametros.politicaACK2: If there is data to be sent in the opposite direction, it will be settled immediately
infoparametros.politicaACK3: If all previous segments have been recognized and a new segment arrives with the expected acknowledgement number, a delayed ACK is sent. During 1.5 ticks the arrival of another correct segment is expected and, in case it is not received, an immediate ACK is sent
infoparametros.politicaACK4: A unique cumulative ACK is sent that recognizes both segments in the event that a segment with an expected sequence number is received and there is another segment in order waiting for your ACK to be transmitted
infoparametros.politicaACK5: If a gap is detected, i.e. a segment with a higher than expected sequence number is received, a duplicate ACK is immediately sent with the sequence number of the next expected octet (lower gap limit)
infoparametros.politicaACK6: If the segment that is received partially or totally completes the gap detected in the received data an ACK is sent immediately if the segment begins with the lower limit of the gap
infoparametros.introducir: The parameters you can fill in are
infoparametros.ip-text: Identifier of the network interface of a device. IPv4 (32 bits) will be used, with format [0-255].
infoparametros.mss-text: Maximum size, in bytes, that a device can receive in a single segment without fragmentation.
infoparametros.datos-text: Size, in bytes, of the data to be sent.
infoparametros.sn-text: Initial sequence number, exchanged at the beginning by both devices, are the identifiers of the data within the byte stream in order to identify and count the bytes of the application.
infoparametros.segperd-text: Segments of data to be sent that do not reach the destination. In the simulation there will be no loss of packets in the connection and closing phase.
infoparametros.w-text: Buffer, in bytes, which has the device in which to store received frames.
infoparametros.timeout-text: Maximum time, in ticks, to consider a package lost because it has not received its corresponding confirmation.
infoparametros.alg-text: Algorithm to be used when there is congestion in the network. In this case you can choose between TCP Tahoe and TCP Reno.
infoparametros.umbral-text: Congestion window limit from which to switch to Congestion Avoidance (CA) mode.
infoparametros.cierre-text: Which device will initiate the end of connection.

error.mensaje: There has been a problem and we have not been able to show you the content, please consider reporting it
